transArray.content: The room was spotlessly clean. The table was wiped clean too! Very satisfied with the front desk service! The breakfast is also delicious, with a full range of Chinese and Western buffet options. The store environment is also very good, and there is also a food delivery robot!
Dear guest, thank you for taking time out of your busy schedule to share your stay experience. You are a little man with a gentleness that is concealed by your publicity. I love you.
